name: EMBER WHIP
description: Unleashes a fiery lash, scorching everything in its path, dealing {minDamage}-{maxDamage} damage. Has a {missChance}% to miss.

start: {attack_name} cracks through the air, a streak of fiery energy trailing behind it.
A wave of intense heat surrounds the whip as {attack_name} is unleashed.
The air grows warm as {attack_name} ignites, ready to lash at {enemy_name}.
With a burst of flame, {attack_name} is unleashed, crackling with fiery energy.
hit: {attack_name} strikes {enemy_name} for {damage} damage, the whip searing their flesh with fiery force.
The flames from {attack_name} scorch {enemy_name} for {damage} damage, leaving a burn across their body.
A fiery lash from {attack_name} finds its mark, dealing {damage} damage and leaving {enemy_name} scorched.
The ember lash of {attack_name} hits {enemy_name} for {damage} damage, setting them alight with pain.
crit: A massive burst of flame erupts from {attack_name}, engulfing {enemy_name} in {damage} damage of fiery wrath!
With explosive fury, {attack_name} lashes out, dealing {damage} critical damage as {enemy_name} burns with intense heat!
The whip crackles with fiery power, sending a wave of fire crashing into {enemy_name} for {damage} devastating damage!
A fiery torrent explodes as {attack_name} strikes with {damage} damage, overwhelming {enemy_name} completely!
miss: {attack_name} whips through the air, but {enemy_name} narrowly avoids the fiery lash.
The flames from {attack_name} lash out, but {enemy_name} dodges just in time.
{attack_name} strikes the air with a fiery crack, but {enemy_name} evades the flames.
The ember whip misses as {enemy_name} nimbly steps out of its fiery path.
